entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people who saw Hermione's reaction to the newspaper.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the person who received the Daily Prophet and reacted to it.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people who saw Hermione's reaction to the newspaper.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a newspaper that arrived at Hermione's place.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as the prison where some people were sent for their crimes.

entities.name: antonin dolohov
entities.description: Antonin Dolohov is mentioned as a person who was convicted of murder and had his picture in the newspaper.

entities.name: gideon prewett
entities.description: Gideon Prewett is mentioned as one of the people murdered by Antonin Dolohov.

entities.name: fabian prewett
entities.description: Fabian Prewett is mentioned as another person murdered by Antonin Dolohov.

relationships.description: Harry is a victim of one of the crimes committed by Antonin Dolohov.
Hermione received the Daily Prophet, which contained news about people who were sent to Azkaban for their crimes.
